column5: But you're still buying on Ebay ... right..
WOOHOOO!!!!!!!          just won my new baitcaster at less than half the price of bass pro.   jason

There are some unbelivable deals there! Yesterday i phoned canadian tire and asked for a quote for drill/slot rotors for an impala and the price i got was 105 $ a piece for front tires and 65 $ a piece for the rear ones.  Went on ebay, found 4 of the same rotors with high performace brake pads for 160$ plus 66$ for shipping.  You can also get 70 spoons and crank baits, random sizes for 69 dollars i think. 250 flies for about 40 dollars, just crazy stuff.  I think if you go through pay pal your credit card number is secure and insured by pay pal. For those who dont have a credit card, cant you just send them a pre paid check or money orders or some other type of payments?

I signed up for ebay account 3 days ago and i already have bought an 8mp polaroid camera, i bought a motherboard with a dual core intel processor i bid on 30 carp flies plus i bought a 4GB memory card for the camera!  I think i might have a problem lol
Cant talk right now....bidding ends in 1 minute.......

I wouldn't say I am addicted. Being addicted means you think you have a problem. I live in Ontario and last summer worked up in the arctic in Nunavut. The first day we got internet in our camp I bought a skidoo on ebay. Over the last few years I have bought 15 fishing reels, tons of tackle, jig molds, lead, hooks, paintball guns, camera, MP3 players, computer gear, fta boxes, banjo, yes a banjo, fish tank gear, clothes, shoes, 5 pairs of rayban sunglasses, speakers, the list goes on. Wow, everywhere I look I see something I bought on ebay. I am typing on the keyboard I bought on ebay, using the computer of which half of the components were purchased on ebay. Maybe I do have a problem. Probably....not. Presently in search of an electric bow mount trolling motor, butt seats and pedestals. Good luck, happy bidding.
That was going to be my line.  I wonder how much we've outbid each other on items???
I wouldn't say I'm addicted, but I do buy alot.  But I also sell so I make the money back (that's what I tell Paul anyhow   )  Joey
i was addicted...first time I got on it I dropped $800 on autographs
Reading some of these comments made me feel better about myself haha As i am typing this just bought some red and green floats for steelheading and some hooks.  now i gotta start selling stuff lol

I have bought a fair bit on Ebay from vehicles to fishing tackle. If one searches there are deals to be had as long as S+H is not ridiculous. Have only had one problem ever and that was with a seller who acknowledged he received my payment but I never received the goods. At his doing we went thru the EBAY appeal process but as soon as I had him dead in the water he quit the appeal process and EBAY could have cared a less and let it go. Thank goodness it was only $20.

I wish I knew how to work the damned thing. The last credit card I tried using wouldnt allow me to do stuff online.  Theres a lot of 130 packs of 3x strike king soft plastics that I would really like to have!
I am and I have a room downstairs full of fishing stuff to prove it

Yes i have hit e-bay pretty hard over the last several years,and its just like walking into a huge candy store isnt it !!!!!!   and i have bought some pretty nice lures,alot of them one of a kind,and lots of different paint jobs on lures that we can get here just not the same paint color weird huh?????....but i dont think im addicted as i couldnt afford to be !!! so i just buy every so often usually in the winter ill pick up some.....cheers good-luck with that addiction,remember   THERES NO SUCH THING AS TOO MANY LURES !!! LOL..LOL..LOL..
I have never been on EBay...just have this thing about giving my credit card number over the internet...
There's no need to give your credit card to buy... if you don't want to.
Twilight, I will give you my phone number... you can just give it to me over the phone..  PS.. I charge 3% extra for Amex.  G
Ya okay...and my son's badge number is....
Hehehehe... what force does he work for if you dont mind me asking... most of my friends are cops to be honest, some of them might know him  PM if you feel more comfortable..  G
Gerritt...PM sent
I can actually do that.. .have my credit card imprinter beside me in the drawer ! Can take M/C and Visa but the buggers hit me for 4.5 and 4.63 % for the "honour".
Wayne, what pay device do I use to make payments through my bank account?
I wouldnt say I'm addicted, btu I just won 5 new pais of sunglasses.

ive bought everything from fishing tackle and hunting gear to nascar tickets, ive been looking at atvs lately and trying to buy a baitcaster right now.  i love it.  i have only been burned once, and thats because it was to good to be true on a pair of binocs,  they came, but just real cheap made.  i guess you get what ya pay for sometimes, but still alot of good deals to be had.  jason
I must ask why you'd need 5 pairs? I assume "pais" means pairs.

not addicted either,  i just buy what i need ( i swear).  kidding aside,  if the stuff i buy off @ ebay are available locally i'll gladly purchase everything from here.   so yeah have purchased watches, computer stuff, pda/cellphone accesories, fishing tackle, reels, rods, lures & baits from asia to europe.  just got my 7ft. fladen celtic sea rod and am dying to try it out @ the harbourfront
I'm not addicted. I've only bought a motorcycle, car, tons of fishing gear, many many guitars, electronics and a boat! Sadly i've been cut off but i can't figure out why
